item.title: algorithms
item.description: Algorithm: A step-by-step procedure or a set of instructions that leads to a desired outcome or a solution to a problem.

item.title: heuristics
item.description: Heuristic: A rule of thumb or a shortcut that helps solve a problem or make a decision quickly and efficiently.

item.title: Survivorship Bias
item.description: aka Survivor Bias logical fallacy that occurs when we focus only on the successful outcomes or examples of a phenomenon, while ignoring or overlooking the failures or negative outcomes
